title: Turkish Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta (penne or rigatoni works well) in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water, then drain.
Crumble or dice the planted into small pieces. Saut√© with olive oil, minced garlic, and Turkish red pepper flakes (pul biber) until browned.
Add tomato paste and cook for 1 minute. Pour in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in dried mint, sumac, and a pinch of Aleppo pepper for authentic Turkish flavor.
Toss the pasta with the sauce, adding pasta water as needed for consistency.
Serve in bowls and top generously with plant-based yogurt, a drizzle of melted butter infused with paprika, and fresh mint leaves.
